fieldset.name: Pseudo Absences
fieldset.label: Pseudo Absence Configuration
fieldset.description: Select and configure your strategy. Read More ...

field.name: pa_ratio
field.description: ratio of absence to presence points
field.title: absence-presence ratio

field.name: pa_strategy
field.description: strategy to generate pseudo-absence points: random; SRE (in sites with contrasting conditions to presences); disk (within a minimum and maximum distance from presences)
field.title: pseudo-absence strategy

field.name: pa_sre_quant
field.description: quantile used for 'SRE' pseudo-absence generation strategy; default is 0.025
field.title: pseudo-absence SRE quantile

field.name: pa_disk_min
field.description: minimum distance (m) to presences for 'disk' pseudo-absence generation strategy
field.title: pseudo-absence disk minimum distance (m)

field.name: pa_disk_max
field.description: maximum distance to presences for 'disk' pseudo-absence generation strategy
field.title: pseudo-absence disk maximum distance

fieldset.name: Other
fieldset.label: Other Configuration
fieldset.description: Options are set to package defaults unless otherwise modified.

field.name: prevalence
field.description: allows to give more or less weight to particular observations; default = NULL: each observation (presence or absence) has the same weight; if value < 0.5: absences are given more weight; if value > 0.5: presences are given more weight
field.title: weighted response weights (prevalence)

field.name: var_import
field.description: number of permutations to estimate the relative importance of each variable
field.title: resampling (VarImport)

field.name: do_full_models
field.description: calibrate & evaluate models with the whole dataset?
field.title: do full models

field.name: method
field.description: method to be used; default = 'class' for presence/absence data
field.title: method

field.name: control_minbucket
field.description: minimum number of observations in any terminal node
field.title: minimum bucket (minbucket)

field.name: control_minsplit
field.description: minimum number of observations that must exist in a node for a split to be attempted
field.title: minimum split (minsplit)

field.name: control_cp
field.description: the growing process will be terminated if the next best split does not reduce the tree's overall complexity by the value of the complexity parameter
field.title: complexity parameter (cp)

field.name: control_maxcompete
field.description: number of competitor splits retained in the output
field.title: competitor splits (maxcompete)

field.name: control_maxsurrogate
field.description: number of surrogate splits retained in the output
field.title: surrogate splits (maxsurrogate)

field.name: control_usesurrogate
field.description: how to use surrogate splits; if 0: observations with missing values for primary split rule are not sent further down the tree; if 1: use surrogates for observations missing values for primary split rule; if 2 (default): if all surrogates are missing then observation is included in major direction
field.title: use of surrogate splits (usesurrogate)

field.name: control_xval
field.description: number of cross-validation subsets created for training (cv folds - 1) and testing (1)
field.title: cross-validation folds (xval)

field.name: control_surrogatestyle
field.description: controls the selection of a best surrogate; if 0 (default): total number of correct classifications is used; if 1: percentage correct classifications is used. 0 value more severely penalizes variables with a large number of missing values
field.title: surrogate selection (surrogatestyle)

field.name: control_maxdepth
field.description: maximum number of splits of the tree
field.title: maximum depth (maxdepth)

field.name: which.penalise
field.description: which penalise option
field.title: which.penalise

field.name: the.penalty
field.description: the penalty
field.title: the.penalty

field.name: random_seed
field.description: random seed used
field.title: random seed
